segments.text: Hello Mary . I haven ’ t seen you for ages . Are you still seeing Paul ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We broke up last month . I ’ m taking a break from dating for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you break up amicably ? Sometimes couples row a lot before splitting up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We just decided to stop seeing each other . It was all very amicable . Are you still going out with mike ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am . We ’ re thinking about getting engaged . We ’ Ve been dating for over a year now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you ! Have you seen Kelly recently ? Is she still dating nick ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I havn't seen her for a while.She stopped seeing nick because he was cheating on her.He was seeing a girl form his office.One day , she saw them holding hands and ended the relationship immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She was right to do that . I heard the Neil and Tina getting married soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? They ’ Ve been together for a long time . When are they getting married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it ’ s 26th September . I ’ ll check and make sure that Tina remembers to invite you to the hen night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Hey , look at that guy over there . I think he fancies you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He certainly looks interested , doesn ’ t he ? Shall we invite him over to our table ?
segments.speaker: S2
